sentences: I love spending time with my family.
Family is very important to me.
translations: אני אוהב לבלות זמן עם המשפחה שלי.

sentences: She is my best friend.
I'm meeting a friend for coffee.
My mother is a wonderful person.
I called my mother to tell her the news.
translations: התקשרתי לאמא שלי לספר לה את החדשות.

sentences: My father taught me many things.
I went fishing with my father last weekend.
translations: אבא שלי לימד אותי דברים רבים.
הלכתי לדוג עם אבא שלי בסוף השבוע שעבר.

sentences: I have an older brother.
My brother is coming to visit.
She has a younger sister.
My sister and I are very close.
She loves her husband very much.
My husband is a great cook.
He is very proud of his wife.
My wife and I enjoy traveling together.
They have a beautiful son.
He is a proud father of his son.
She has a lovely daughter.
They are very proud of their daughter.
Friendship is a valuable thing.
Their friendship has lasted for many years.
Love makes the world go round.
They share a deep love for each other.
translations: הם חולקים אהבה עמוקה זה לזה.

sentences: She is my life partner.
They work together as business partners.
Communication is key to a healthy relationship.
They have a strong and loving relationship.
translations: תקשורת היא המפתח למערכת יחסים בריאה.
יש להם מערכת יחסים חזקה ואוהבת.

sentences: The child was playing happily.
Parents are responsible for their child's upbringing.
My parents are very supportive.
They are loving parents to their children.
My grandfather tells great stories.
I enjoy visiting my grandfather.
translations: אני נהנה לבקר את סבא שלי.

sentences: My grandmother is a wonderful cook.
We spent the holiday with our grandmother.
translations: בילינו את החג עם סבתא שלנו.

sentences: My uncle lives in another city.
We went to visit my uncle and aunt.
My aunt always gives good advice.
I have several aunts on my mother's side.
translations: יש לי כמה דודות מצד אמא שלי.

sentences: My sister has a new baby nephew.
I enjoy playing with my nephew.
translations: אני נהנה לשחק עם האחיין שלי.

sentences: My brother has a lovely niece.
I bought a gift for my niece.
I have many cousins.
We had a family reunion with all our cousins.
translations: הייתה לנו פגישת מחזור משפחתית עם כל בני הדודים שלנו.

sentences: Her friendliness makes everyone feel welcome.
Friendliness is a positive trait.
translations: הידידותיות שלה גורמת לכולם להרגיש רצויים.

sentences: They offer each other great support.
I appreciate your support during this time.
translations: הם מציעים זה לזה תמיכה רבה.
אני מעריך את תמיכתך בתקופה זו.

sentences: Trust is essential in any relationship.
It takes time to build trust.
translations: אמון הוא חיוני בכל מערכת יחסים.

sentences: Honesty is the best policy.
I value honesty in my friends.
We should always treat each other with respect.
He earned the respect of his colleagues.
translations: תמיד עלינו להתייחס זה לזה בכבוד.

sentences: They tried to avoid conflict.
Communication can help resolve conflict.
Good communication is vital in a relationship.
They had open and honest communication.
translations: תקשורת טובה היא חיונית במערכת יחסים.

sentences: Compromise is often necessary in a partnership.
They reached a compromise on the issue.
The process of reconciliation took time.
They hoped for reconciliation after the argument.
He tried to control his anger.
Anger can lead to negative outcomes.
Empathy helps us understand others' feelings.
She showed great empathy towards her friend.
translations: אמפתיה עוזרת לנו להבין את רגשות האחרים.
היא גילתה אמפתיה רבה כלפי חברתה.

sentences: Forgiveness can be difficult but healing.
He asked for forgiveness for his mistake.
translations: סליחה יכולה להיות קשה אך מרפאת.

sentences: Understanding each other is important.
She showed a lot of understanding.
Laughter is the best medicine.
Their conversation was filled with laughter.
She showed great compassion for those in need.
Compassion is a valuable human quality.
translations: היא גילתה חמלה רבה כלפי הנזקקים.

sentences: Parents often make sacrifices for their children.
He made a personal sacrifice for the team.
translations: הורים לרוב מקריבים קורבנות למען ילדיהם.
הוא הקריב קורבן אישי למען הקבוצה.

sentences: Patience is a virtue.
It requires patience to learn a new skill.
translations: נדרשת סבלנות כדי ללמוד מיומנות חדשה.

sentences: They had a minor argument.
It's important to resolve arguments peacefully.
They strive for harmony in their home.
The community lived in harmony.
They share a strong bond.
The bond between siblings is often very close.
translations: הקשר בין אחים הוא לרוב מאוד קרוב.

sentences: They felt a strong connection.
Building a connection with others is important.
translations: בניית חיבור עם אחרים היא חשובה.

sentences: Attachment theory describes the importance of early bonds.
The child showed a strong attachment to their caregiver.
translations: תאוריית ההיקשרות מתארת את חשיבות הקשרים המוקדמים.
הילד גילה היקשרות חזקה למטפל שלו.

sentences: They showed their affection openly.
Affection is important in close relationships.
The trip was a great opportunity for family bonding.
They enjoyed the bonding experience.
translations: הטיול היה הזדמנות נהדרת להתגבשות משפחתית.

sentences: Intimacy involves emotional and physical closeness.
Building intimacy takes time and trust.
He is a very reliable friend.
We need a reliable car for the trip.
She is a dependable colleague.
You can always count on him, he's very dependable.
translations: תמיד אפשר לסמוך עליו, הוא מאוד אמין.

sentences: Loyalty is a key aspect of true friendship.
They showed great loyalty to their team.
translations: נאמנות היא היבט מרכזי של ידידות אמיתית.
הם גילו נאמנות רבה לצוות שלהם.

sentences: He is a very affectionate person.
They shared an affectionate hug.
I have fond memories of our time together.
She is very fond of her grandchildren.
translations: יש לי זיכרונות נעימים מהזמן שלנו ביחד.

sentences: I felt sympathy for her situation.
They expressed their sympathy for his loss.
translations: הם הביעו את אהדתם על אובדנו.

sentences: He offered words of consolation.
She found consolation in her friends' support.
Can I help you with something?
They offered their help willingly.
We appreciate your assistance with this project.
He provided valuable assistance.
translations: אנו מעריכים את סיועך בפרויקט זה.

sentences: We work together as a team.
The team celebrated their victory.
Cooperation is essential for success.
They showed great cooperation on the task.
translations: הם גילו שיתוף פעולה נהדר במשימה.

sentences: She is a very compassionate person.
They offered compassionate support.
Their story is full of romance.
They enjoyed a romantic evening.
They started dating a few months ago.
Dating can be an interesting experience.
translations: הם התחילו לצאת לפני כמה חודשים.

sentences: She introduced me to her boyfriend.
My boyfriend is very supportive.
translations: היא הציגה אותי בפני החבר שלה.

sentences: He is taking his girlfriend to the movies.
My girlfriend is a talented artist.
They celebrated their tenth wedding anniversary.
Marriage is a big commitment.
translations: הם חגגו את יום נישואיהם העשירי.

sentences: We are going to a wedding this weekend.
Their wedding was a beautiful celebration.
translations: אנחנו הולכים לחתונה בסוף השבוע הזה.

sentences: Marriage requires a strong commitment.
He showed great commitment to his work.
They went through a difficult divorce.
Divorce can be a painful process.
She is currently single.
He enjoys being single.
They enjoy spending time together.
We will face this challenge together.
translations: אנחנו נתמודד עם האתגר הזה ביחד.

sentences: They decided to have a trial separation.
The separation was difficult for both of them.
translations: הם החליטו על תקופת ניסיון של פרידה.

sentences: Jealousy can damage relationships.
He felt a pang of jealousy.
He is a very trustworthy person.
We need someone trustworthy for this task.
translations: אנחנו צריכים מישהו ראוי לאמון למשימה הזו.

sentences: His words really hurt me.
She tried to hide her hurt feelings.
translations: היא ניסתה להסתיר את רגשותיה הפגועים.

sentences: Betrayal can be very painful.
He felt a deep sense of betrayal.
Healthy relationships avoid excessive dependency.
He struggled with emotional dependency.
translations: מערכות יחסים בריאות נמנעות מתלות מוגזמת.
